stable.changelog:

beta.changelog:
- (NEW) Added support per-app language (Android 13)
- (FIX) landscape orientation editor
- (REVERT) Ignore EXIF info for image orientation and force use device screen orientation
- (INT) Hide WiFi Transfer option wen installed in Android TV
- (INT) Drop all experimental code feature for a stability
- (INT) Small bug fixes and changes
